properties.tree_location: Front yard, immediately left of entrance gate, borders neighboring house and driveway, branches overhang neighbor's driveway
properties.tree_description:
Branches from our tree on the left side of the picture (the more narrow tree) haven fallen on my neighbor's car and shattered the back windshield.  She is insisting that the tree be removed, but it still has foliage on it.  She believes the tree is diseased and is an imminent threat to her property. She also claims she knows the head arborist for the city and she will be able to get a permit easily.  I would rather not remove a tree unless it is truly appropriate.  If you feel it is appropriate, we will remove that tree.  If not, we would be happy to prune the branches that overhang her driveway.  Thank you.  Reason for Removal:Dying treeComments:Branches from our tree on the left side of the picture (the more narrow tree) haven fallen on my neighbor's car and shattered the back windshield.  She is insisting that the tree be removed, but it still has foliage on it.  She believes the tree is diseased and is an imminent threat to her property. She also claims she knows the head arborist for the city and she will be able to get a permit easily.  I would rather not remove a tree unless it is truly appropriate.  If you feel it is appropriate, we will remove that tree.  If not, we would be happy to prune the branches that overhang her driveway.  Thank you.
